text.div:
Invasive Haemophilus influenzae Disease (Tests for Haemophilus influenzae Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    29906-5 Haemophilus influenzae A DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    29907-3 Haemophilus influenzae B DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    5006-2 Haemophilus influenzae rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    51668-2 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA and Haemophilus influenza DNA and Pseudomonas aeruginosa DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    53607-8 Haemophilus influenzae B DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    58473-0 Haemophilus influenzae serotype DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    61366-1 Haemophilus influenzae DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    62493-2 Streptococcus pneumoniae DNA and Haemophilus influenza DNA and Streptococcus agalactiae DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    76574-3 Haemophilus influenzae lex2 gene [Presence] in XXX.swab by NAA with probe detection
    76589-1 Haemophilus influenzae lex2 gene [#/mass] in XXX.tissue by NAA with probe detection
    76602-2 Haemophilus influenzae lex2 gene [#/volume] in XXX.body fluid by NAA with probe detection
    82183-5 Haemophilus influenzae DNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with non-probe detection
    85627-8 Haemophilus influenzae hpd gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85678-1 Haemophilus influenzae acs gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85679-9 Haemophilus influenzae bex gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85680-7 Haemophilus influenzae ecs gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85681-5 Haemophilus influenzae dcs gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85682-3 Haemophilus influenzae ccs gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    85683-1 Haemophilus influenzae bcs gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92127-0 Haemophilus influenzae DNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
